mapper.sql: d.id, d.parent_code parentCode, d.dict_code dictCode, d.dict_name dictName, d.dict_value dictValue, d.value_type valueType, d.value_parser valueParser, d.dict_order dictOrder, d.is_default isDefault, d.status, d.css, d.create_by createBy, d.create_time createTime, d.update_by updateBy, d.update_time updateTime, d.remark
mapper.select:
select case d.parent_code when 'root' then '根字典' when 'group' then '根字典' else g.dict_name end groupName, case d.parent_code when 'root' then 'root' when 'group' then 'root' else g.dict_code end groupCode, case d.parent_code when 'root' then '根字典' else t.dict_name end typeName, case d.parent_code when 'root' then 'root' else t.dict_code end typeCode,
from hub_dict d left join hub_dict t on d.parent_code = t.dict_code left join hub_dict g on t.parent_code = g.dict_code where d.id > 1
and d.dict_code like concat('%', #{dictCode}, '%')
order by d.parent_code, d.dict_order

select case d.parent_code when 'root' then '根字典' when 'group' then '根字典' else g.dict_name end groupName, case d.parent_code when 'root' then 'root' when 'group' then 'root' else g.dict_code end groupCode, case d.parent_code when 'root' then '根字典' else t.dict_name end typeName, case d.parent_code when 'root' then 'root' else t.dict_code end typeCode,
from hub_dict d left join hub_dict t on d.parent_code = t.dict_code left join hub_dict g on t.parent_code = g.dict_code where d.id = #{id}

with types as (select parent_code, dict_code from hub_dict where parent_code = #{groupCode}) select
from hub_dict d, types where d.parent_code = types.dict_code

select t.group_code, d1.dict_name group_name, t.type_code, d2.dict_name type_name from (select parent_code as group_code, dict_code as type_code from hub_dict where parent_code = #{groupCode} union all select d.parent_code as group_code, d.dict_code as type_code from hub_dict d join hub_dict g on d.parent_code = g.dict_code where g.parent_code = #{groupCode} ) t left join hub_dict d1 on t.group_code = d1.dict_code left join hub_dict d2 on t.type_code = d2.dict_code
